uniques: Free [Great Scientist] appears <upon discovering [Writing] technology>

[+2] Movement <for [Water] units>
Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Renaissance era]>

[+1 Production] from every [Strategic resource]
Double quantity of [Horses] produced

Double quantity of [Uranium] produced

[+1 Gold] from each Trade Route
Double quantity of [Oil] produced

[-50]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
No damage penalty for wounded units <for [non-[Air]] units>
[-50]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities]
When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [67]% chance>
[-25]% maintenance costs <for [Land] units>
[-70]% maintenance costs <for [Water] units>
When defeating a [{Barbarian} {Water}] unit, earn [25] Gold and recruit it <with [50]% chance>
[+2 Science] from every specialist [in all cities]
[+2 Science] from every [Great Improvement]
Receive a tech boost when scientific buildings/wonders are built in capital
All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.

Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <starting from the [Ancient era]>
[+2] Sight <for [Embarked] units>
[+10]% Strength <within [2] tiles of a [Moai]>
[+50]% [Food] from City-States
[+50]% [Culture] from City-States
[+52]% [Faith] from City-States
Military Units gifted from City-States start with [+20] XP

Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities

[{Military} {Land}] units gain the [Amphibious] promotion

Earn [100]% of killed [Military] unit's [Strength] as [Culture]

[-50]% maintenance on road & railroads

[1] Movement point cost to disembark <for [All] units>
No movement cost to pillage <for [Melee] units>

Cities are razed [2] times as fast
Starts with [Animal Husbandry]
Retain [50]% of the happiness from a luxury after the last copy has been traded away
Gain [90] Influence with a [Great Person] gift to a City-State
When declaring friendship, both parties gain a [10]% boost to great person generation
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [5] turns.
Gain a free [Harbor] [in all coastal cities]
Land units may cross [Mountain] tiles after the first [Great General] is earned
May choose [1] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
[+1 Faith] [in all cities] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [{unimproved} {Forest}] tiles>
[+2 Faith] [in all cities] <with [3] to [6] neighboring [{unimproved} {Forest}] tiles>

Receive a free Great Person at the end of every [Maya Long Count calendar cycle] (every 394 years), after researching [Theology]. Each bonus person can only be chosen once.
